desc: Artwork by Makk artists, Eva Makk, Americo Makk, A.B. Makk and Sylvia Makk. Giclees, reproductions on canvas, reproductions on metal, original oil paintings, portraits, murals, commissioned artwork and original masterpieces. Metal prints and canvas prints. Keepsake boxes. Jewelry boxes.
